name: ProjectAssessmentMeetings
0:
”Alexa, open project assessment meetings”
”Alexa, start project assessment meetings”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: project assessment meetings
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill is enabled using the resources provided from learningconnect.org. Please reference learningconnect.org to discover how Alexa can increase student achievement and student success through project-based learning. By creating high-performance team strategies, students can strengthen leadership, communications, creativity, problem-solving and research skills. Each project team-building tool can help students form deep, long-term knowledge connections and activate the learning and processing skills that all students possess.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
